typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Timestamp as long,
		cal0_MeasuredValue as string,
		cal1_MeasuredValue as string,
		cal2_MeasuredValue as string,
		cal3_MeasuredValue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (concat('Select top(100000) Timestamp, cal0_MeasuredValue, cal1_MeasuredValue, cal2_MeasuredValue, cal3_MeasuredValue from combined order by Timestamp desc')),
	format: 'query') ~> source1
